title: VAIKO STOPPED EN ROUTE TO SANCHI AT MADHYA PRADESH BORDER
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana Over 1,000 Marumalarcha Drvida Munnetra Kazagam (MDMK) workers led by the outfit’s General Secretary Vaiko  who were  on their way to Sanchi in a convoy of 41 buses to protest against the visiting Sri Lanka President  Mahinda Rajapaksa were stopped by the Madhya Pradesh police….
